item.title: When you fly with Sri Lankan Airlines to Sri Lanka, you will receive a complimentary Mobitel SIM card and free data
item.description:
Passengers who purchase their tickets online through SriLankan Airlines receive a complimentary SIM card with data and the option to rent a dongle for internet access in Sri Lanka. The airline teamed up with the data network provider Mobitel to offer travelers a free SIM card with 100MB of data. For those who need a dongle, one can be rented for 30 days for a refundable deposit of Rs3,490. Full details about the offer are available here...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/when-you-fly-with-sri-lankan-airlines-to-sri-lanka-you-will-receive-a-complimentary-mobitel-sim-card-and-free-data/

item.title: Sports Camera Lets You Web The Surf
item.description:
Have you ever thought about filming your surfing adventures and sharing them online? One of the easiest ways to do this is by using a GoPro Surf HERO waterproof digital camera. This camera boasts an ultra-wide 170-degree lens and can be mounted on your surfboard’s deck. Alternatively, you can use the stick-on baseplate. Its wide-angle lens can easily fit a 6'2" surfer riding a 6-foot surfboard within the frame. Simply press the shutter button before paddling out, and the camera will record up to 56 minutes of high-quality video...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/sports-camera-lets-you-web-the-surf/

item.title: Biotherm Homme releases kite surfing video in collaboration with The Dose skincare
item.description:
Source: L’Oréal. Biotherm Homme, a high-end men’s skincare brand, has introduced “The Dose,” a product line designed to address the daily needs of men across four areas: feeling refreshed, energized, youthful, and charismatic. To showcase “The Dose,” Biotherm Homme has also created an immersive 360° video featuring Youri Zoon, a world champion kitesurfer, as he executes awe-inspiring stunts. Want to learn more? Experience it firsthand...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/biotherm-homme-releases-kite-surfing-video-in-collaboration-with-the-dose-skincare/
